name: Sentinel (itch) (Fertrick)
description:
Sentinel is a an tower defense game in a magical world, where you have to collect some resources while you protect your base from the enemies!

Development time: Month and a half (Feb 14 - Mar 27 2023)

Credits

Music:

Menu - Music from #Uppbeat (free for Creators!): https://uppbeat.io/t/kevin-macleod/achaidh-cheide License code: EHXVT395BEIPQJQ

Level 1 and 2 - Music from #Uppbeat (free for Creators!): https://uppbeat.io/t/kevin-macleod/folk-round License code: UGKFSTREXRZKTGB6

VFX sounds: 

https://freesound.org/

Yellow tree:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/voxel-environments...

Book and Gems sprites:

https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack

VFX:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/all-in-1-vfx-toolkit-206665

All the other assets like towers, wizards, houses, trees, gold, stones as well as all the UI sprites are made by:

- Fernando Tarango

- Paulina Torres

- Brayan Prieto
